question:

explanation: Meerut Conspiracy case was started in 1929. Several leaders were arrested likeÂ  P. C. Joshi, Muzaffar Ahmed, S.A. Dange, S. V. Ghate, Gopal Basak. The name of the two British communists was Benjamin Bradley and Philip Spratt.
